projects.title: Task Management Dashboard
projects.description: A full-stack web application for managing tasks and projects with real-time collaboration features. Users can create teams, assign tasks, set deadlines, and track progress with an intuitive dashboard interface.

projects.title: Personal Finance Tracker
projects.description: A responsive web app that helps users track expenses, set budgets, and visualize spending patterns. Features include transaction categorization, monthly reports, and financial goal setting with interactive charts.
